text:

I can't find any workaround. 

one of may variations of the schema tag I tried is this:

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
        targetNamespace="http://www.gerdcastan.de/MusiXML"
        xmlns:MusiXML="http://www.gerdcastan.de/MusiXML"
        version="0.1"
	 elementFormDefault = "unqualified">

Best regards,
  Gerd

text:
Now it doesn't report an error if it fails switching to the grammar for schema 
namespace.
